issue.title: fix extracting of properties implemented by default interface method …

repository.name: assertj
repository.description: Fluent testing assertions for Java and the JVM

body:
I caused this regression with https://github.com/joel-costigliola/assertj-core/commit/b996e82a86a19b40e80ee0741a5ace56145228b1

Sorry everybody. :(

@PascalSchumacher the main issue for me was the lack of tests with default methods, that would have caught the regression, hopefully we have great users and we now are aware of that.

@adammichalik is it a blocking issue for you ? said otherwise can you wait for 3.7.0 to be released or do you want a bugfix release ?
@joel-costigliola I can stick to 3.5.2 for now, no rush. Thanks for fixing it!
@joel-costigliola I'd really appreciate 3.6.x release with this bugfix sooner than 3.7.0.
@Xaerxess we can do that by the end of the week.
@Xaerxess  @adammichalik  Fixed in 3.6.2 which is available in maven central repo.
